name: Crazy Tower Defense
description:
This is a tower defense game made for the Mix and Game Jam. In it you have to power your towers by driving people to them with driving mechanics similar to Crazy Taxi. Alt f4 to close game (ran out of time).

Instructions:

1). Start each level by purchasing defenses to place around the map (Funds are shown at the top).

2). Once the level has started drive to towers and power them by putting people at them. Q puts people in a tower and E retrieves them, WASD to move.

3). You only have 4 people that you can drive around so you must move them between towers as needed.

4). Space switches between car view and top down view. 

5). Have fun.

Notes:

I would have made it possible to let some enemies though without losing but I ran out of time.
